descriptionHtml:
Sai [user request]

Installation:
Copy meshes + textures folder & SAI.esp to your Skyrim\\data directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\SAI\\ ALL NIF FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\SAI\\ ALL DDS FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\SAI.esp

Make sure that the plugin is activated in launcher => DATA FILES.
The weapon is placed in the forge-menu along with the steel items.

OR open console (key ^) and enter HELP SAI 4
You get a code, after that enter PLAYER.ADDITEM CODE 1
(1 = amount) - the weapon will be placed in your inventory.

(Code should look like XX000D63, XX= the load number of the mod, for example PLAYER.ADDITEM 12000D63 1)

Damage should scale with your skills/lvl, if you want to adjust the dmg open the Creation Kit, LOAD, check SKYRIM.ESM 
and SAI.ESP in the left window, set SAI.ESP to ACTIVE FILE and press OK. In the object window check ITEMS and WEAPONS, 
search for SAI and open the found form, adjust the dmg/speed values in this window, press OK and SAVE.

greetings
Ghosu
